name: X_X
description:
Imagine this: you apply for university. And suddenly they invite you to an application interview. Of course you grab your best shirt, nice pants, socks and shoes and even put on underwear! You are ready to go! Brimming with enthusiasm! But as soon as you enter the university building, you begin to fear what may lay ahead of you, trembeling with nervousness. And even more annoying: other people wanting to stop you with side quests. Will you make it to and through the interview without loosing your mind?

Created by: Philipp Labner, Maximilian Punz
